text: Paralepetopsis is a genus of sea snails, the true limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Neolepetopsidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Paralepetopsis include: * Paralepetopsis clementensis McLean, 2008 * Paralepetopsis ferrugivora Warén & Bouchet, 2001 * Paralepetopsis floridensis McLean, 1990 * Paralepetopsis lepichoni Warén & Bouchet, 2001 * Paralepetopsis sasakii Warén & Bouchet, 2009 * Paralepetopsis tunnicliffae McLean, 2008 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neolepetopsidae
title: Paralepetopsis
